name: BLOBOT
description:
Heads up: the game isn't finished! I hope this short demo interests you anyways.

Solve puzzles in a test facility and reach the exit!
You can move in a grid, and each step is counted.
Get your tiny blob shaped robot companion to help you! His AI was trained on footage of cats, so he's easily distractable...

Well...

The robot, and the many levels relying on it, are missing from this demo. Whoops.
Controls are explained ingame, can be viewed from pause menu (Esc)

Developed solo by me, in 84 hours for the WOWIE! Jam 4.0. Made with Godot.

Development will be finished past the jam deadline anyways.

This was a fun project, and i especially had fun with audio!
